com.sleepycat.bdb.bind.tuple
Class TupleInputBinding

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.sleepycat.bdb.bind.tuple.TupleInputBinding
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataBinding
public class TupleInputBinding
extends Object
implements DataBinding

A concrete tuple binding for keys or values which are TupleInput objects. This binding is used when tuples themselves are the data object, rather than using application defined objects. A TupleInput must always be used. To convert a TupleOutput to a TupleInput, use the TupleInput.TupleInput(TupleOutput) constructor.

          Creates a tuple input binding.
